sn22.47:4.2: “Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā anekavihitaṃ attānaṃ samanupassamānā samanupassanti, sabbete pañcupādānakkhandhe samanupassanti, etesaṃ vā aññataraṃ.
sn22.47:4.4: Idha, bhikkhave, assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṃ adassāvī ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme avinīto, sappurisānaṃ adassāvī sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinīto rūpaṃ attato samanupassati, rūpavantaṃ vā attānaṃ;
sn22.47:4.5: attani vā rūpaṃ, rūpasmiṃ vā attānaṃ.
sn22.47:4.9: viññāṇaṃ attato samanupassati, viññāṇavantaṃ vā attānaṃ;
sn22.47:4.10: attani vā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇasmiṃ vā attānaṃ.
sn22.47:5.1: Iti ayañceva samanupassanā ‘asmī’ti cassa avigataṃ hoti.
sn22.47:5.2: ‘Asmī’ti kho pana, bhikkhave, avigate pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ avakkanti hoti—
sn22.47:5.4: Atthi, bhikkhave, mano, atthi dhammā, atthi avijjādhātu.
sn22.47:5.5: Avijjāsamphassajena, bhikkhave, vedayitena phuṭṭhassa assutavato puthujjanassa ‘asmī’tipissa hoti;
sn22.47:6.1: Tiṭṭhanteva kho, bhikkhave, tattheva pañcindriyāni.
sn22.47:6.2: Athettha sutavato ariyasāvakassa avijjā pahīyati, vijjā uppajjati.
